TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute Inherits AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

Docs.summary: Specifies that an attached property is browsable only for elements that derive from a specified type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 一詞的意義`browsable`會用在此描述[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]類似於提供的描述<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>，附加屬性的可瀏覽狀態是特別針對屬性資訊，但[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，附加的屬性主要是因為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念。
如果指定一個以上的類型<xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]，屬性是可瀏覽，如果指定任何型別相符項目 (邏輯或)。 型別也可以是介面。
這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]指定<xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A> `true`。
這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]只會套用在附加的屬性定義的 get 存取子。 不適用這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]set 存取子。 雖然直覺的方式是設定作業是由可瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]相關的項目，它是目前狀態和 get 存取子的屬性定義控制，則為 true 的行為項目上的特性。
如需宣告的附加屬性的一般資訊，請參閱[附加屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會支援這所公開的一個可能可設定值的值相等性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>。

Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

Docs.summary: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作支援多個這所公開的一個可能可設定值為基礎的雜湊值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， <xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute.TargetType%2A>。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetType As Type
public: property Type ^ TargetType { Type ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the base type that scopes the use of the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是可設定只能透過[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]所公開的宣告<xref:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute>建構函式。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TypeId As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ TypeId { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a unique type identifier for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個實作會傳回每個唯一值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]，這是因為這[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]可讓多個使用方式。
